wordGroup: rheumatoid arthritis 风湿性关节炎

sentences.en: One example of an autoimmune disease is rheumatoid arthritis.
sentences.cn: 类风湿性关节炎是自身免疫疾病的一种，患者常会出现疲劳感。

sentences.en: Rheumatoid arthritis is a painful condition that affects your joints.
sentences.cn: 风湿性关节炎是影响关节令人痛苦的疾病。
